title: July Patreon Preview - A Friendly Ghost
itunes:title: July Patreon Preview - A Friendly Ghost
description:
Hello! And welcome to this month’s patreon preview. If you are curious about patreon and want to hear what is available if you sign up then please stick around for this episode. I mention patreon on every episode so at the beginning of each month, I am going to give you a little preview of what is available on patreon.com/reallifeghoststories 


You can sign up to Patreon for either $2 or $5 a month to get all main and mini episodes of Real Life Ghost Stories completely ad free. There are also extra film reviews, giveaways, bonus q and as and much more. Remember patreon is entirely flexible and you can delete your pledge instantly at any time. 


For $2 a month you get access to over 50 episodes of bonus content. For $5 a month you get access to over 150 extra episodes. Every Monday I release an episode of Tiny Tales. Sometimes, its a collection of spooky stories, sometimes it a special guest episode where a knowledgable person comes on and tells their own paranormal tales. And lately, once a month we have been doing a no sleep special where we find the scariest spooky story from the depths of the internet. For today’s preview you will be hearing a snippet of an episode of Tiny Tales. 


Today's snippet is from The Fortean Times


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
